'React' is Erick Sermon's fifth album. It received mediocre critical and
commercial success despite featuring the single "React" which was a Rhythmic Top
40 and Billboard Hot 100 hit. John Bush of Allmusic describes it as being a
"hardcore follow-up to his 2001 crossover hit [[Music (Erick Sermon
album)|Music]]" as well as commenting on its "dark tone" and "raw raps".[]
